parameters.name: Sensor
parameters.label: Corelight Sensor
parameters.query:
union isfuzzy=true
corelight_corelight_metrics_iface, corelight_corelight_metrics_system, corelight_corelight_metrics_memory, corelight_corelight_metrics_disk, corelight_corelight_metrics_zeek_doctor
| distinct sensor_name
| sort by sensor_name

content.json: >**NOTE:** If the overview dashboard and its panels are not showing data, please make sure you have configured your Corelight Sensors to export statistics to Sentinel. More Information can be found here: [**Corelight Support**](https://corelight.com/support/).

content.title: Combined Traffic Volume - Monitor Interfaces
Combined Traffic Volume - Monitor Interfaces - Packets
Traffic Volume - Management Interface
Traffic Volume - Management Interface - Packets
Memory Usage
System Temperature
Disk Usage

content.query:
corelight_corelight_metrics_zeek_doctor
| where isnotempty(check_tcp_retransmissions_percent) and
        ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor}))
| summarize avg_value = avg(check_tcp_retransmissions_percent)
| project avg_value = iff(isnan(avg_value), toreal(0), round(avg_value, 2))
content.title: Avg TCP Retransmissions
